|                   | In code and docs  |

| Exceptionally flexible and powerful   |

| Col 1 | Col 2 | Col 3 | Col 4 | Col 5 |

## Second

+---------------------+----------+
| Property            | Earth    |
+=============+=======+==========+
|             | min   | -89.2 °C |
| Temperature +-------+----------+
| 1961-1990   | mean  | 14 °C    |
|             +-------+----------+
|             | min   | 56.7 °C  |
+-------------+-------+----------+

## Markdown in cells

+---------------+---------------+--------------------+
| Fruit         | Price         | Advantages         |
+===============+===============+====================+
| Bananas       | $1.34         | - built-in wrapper |
|               |               | - bright color     |

| Oranges       | $2.10         | - cures scurvy     |
|               |               | - tasty            |
